amendment.description: At the end of division A (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. _. None of the finds made available by this Act may be used to purchase heavy water from Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to prohibit funds from being used to purchase heavy water from Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. DeSantis.
